name: R5-MeasureImprovementNotation-R4-MeasureImprovementNotation
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MeasureImprovementNotation into FHIR R4

target.display: Improvement is indicated as a decrease in the score or measurement (e.g. Lower score indicates better quality).
target.comment: R5 `decrease` is assumed equivalent to R4 `decrease` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: Improvement is indicated as an increase in the score or measurement (e.g. Higher score indicates better quality).
target.comment: R5 `increase` is assumed equivalent to R4 `increase` (no map, but codes match)
